"A.P.239/5/4": "Ah... Umm... You two..."
"... What are you doing here, Claris Claes. Aren't you supposed to be at Naberius?"
"Hmph. That's my line. Weren't you supposed to report about your mission on Naberius?"
"I finished my report already, so there's no problem with me being here right?"
"I'm the same as you! Besides, I have business with my predecessor."
"Oh, too bad, I also have business with her."
"So to say, you kept calling her your \"predecessor\", isn't time you stop doing that and call Matoi by her name?"
"She's my predecessor, so it's fine. Besides aren't you abit rude calling her without honorifics Sara?"
"There's no problem with that. Matoi doesn't mind it at all."
"Who knows-? Maybe she doesn't like it? Isn't that right predecessor?"
"Even so, without saying anything, she probably doesn't like you calling her by that. Right Matoi?"
"...Well, I think I don't mind being called without honorifics or being called predecessor-..."
"Make youself clear!"
"Make youself clear!"
"S-sorry!"
"Urgh, why are they angry at me?"
"Oh... <%me>! Help! I don't know what to do!"
"1. What are you doing?"
"2. Both of them probably have a goal."
"I don't know either. Both of them suddenly came to me and started arguing with each other."
"... Their goal?"
"Oh yeah, that's right. I didn't come here to argue with this moron."
"I also didn't come here to argue. I just got caught with Sara's quarrel."
"Umm, both of you said you have business with me right? Did I do something wrong?"
"No, that's not it!"
"Predecessor didn't do anything wrong!"
"Then... What is it?"
"Here!"
"Here!"
"... Aren't these flowers that bloom in Naberius?"
"I thought of you and picked these up...!"
"I picked these up, thinking of predecessor..."
"Why did you two..."
"I was in your care back then. So I wanted to give you something as my graditude."
"But, I didn't know what to give you. When I thought of something you would like, I picked these up."
"I thought of giving you something better than this but..."
"Other than that, I thought that these were nice."
"I love these flowers. Right, <%me>?"
"Both of you, thank you. I'm soo happy"
"... But, what I really like about it, were your feelings."
"They're really warm... thank you."
